You plan to visit 5 European cities for 18 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 5 days in Dubrovnik. You would like to meet your friends at Dubrovnik between day 5 and day 9 to tour together. You would like to visit Rome for 5 days. You plan to stay in London for 2 days. You would like to visit Stuttgart for 7 days. You want to spend 3 days in Madrid. You have to attend a workshop in Madrid between day 9 and day 11.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Rome and Stuttgart, Rome and Dubrovnik, Dubrovnik and Madrid, Rome and Madrid, Rome and London, London and Stuttgart, Madrid and London.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 18 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
